Content:: The Gift (Irish: An Bronntanas) is a 2014 Irish thriller film directed by Tommy Collins. It was selected as the Irish entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 87th Academy Awards, but was not nominated.[1][2] This article related to an Irish film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about a 2010s thriller film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
